control.description-key: BarCode is a barcode generator written in JavaScript (based on JsBarcode). It supports multiple barcode formats.

property.name: barCodeValue
property.description-key: Value of the barcode to be rendered.

property.name: format
property.description-key: Define the format of the barcode used (ean/upc, code128, code39, itf, msi, pharmacode or codabar).

property.name: text
property.description-key: Allows you to enter a text to be displayed instead of the barcode.

property.name: fontOptions
property.description-key: With fontOptions you can add bold or italic text to the barcode.

property.name: font
property.description-key: Define the font used for the text in the generated barcode. This can be any default font or a font defined by a @font-face rule.

property.name: width
property.description-key: The width option is the width of a single bar.

property.name: height
property.description-key: The height of the barcode.

property.name: displayValue
property.description-key: Allows you to display or not the value of the barcode or the chosen text.

property.name: textAlign
property.description-key: Set the horizontal alignment of the text. Can be left / center / right.

property.name: textPosition
property.description-key: Set the vertical position of the text. Can be bottom / top.

property.name: textMargin
property.description-key: Set the space between the barcode and the text.

property.name: fontSize
property.description-key: Set the size of the text.

property.name: backgroundColor
property.description-key: Set the background of the barcode.

property.name: lineColor
property.description-key: Set the color of the bars and the text.

property.name: margin
property.description-key: Set the space margin around the barcode. If nothing else is set, all side will inherit the margins property but can be replaced if you want to set them separably.

property.name: marginTop
property.description-key: Set the top space margin around the barcode.

property.name: marginBottom
property.description-key: Set the bottom space margin around the barcode.

property.name: marginLeft
property.description-key: Set the left space margin around the barcode.

property.name: marginRight
property.description-key: Set the right space margin around the barcode.

property.name: flat
property.description-key: Only for EAN8/EAN13
